tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Water_Usage_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    water_meter_id INT,
    building_id INT,
    usage_date TIMESTAMP,
    daily_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Water_Usage_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(100),
    water_meter_id INT,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Green_Building_Initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    water_usage DECIMAL,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityReporting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    report_year INT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT,
    water_footprint FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsageData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    water_consumption FLOAT,
    date_recorded DATE
)
